entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8 except plus 4 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High 8 except plus 4 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
